pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regression Models for Meta Signal Detection Theory // Regression methods for the meta-SDT model. The package implements methods for cognitive experiments of meta cognition as described in Kristensen, S. B., Sandberg, K., Bibby, B. M. (2020). Regression methods for metacognitive sensitivity. Journal of Mathematical Psychology, 94. doi:10.1016/j.jmp.2019.102297.
